Reviews.Title: Wow! What a deal!
Reviews.Author: S. Clark
Reviews.Content: I researched and researched looking for the best machine I could get for my money and I could not be happier after purchasing the Toshiba C855-S5194.  But........I purchased it locally at a major office supply store because their 'in store' discount coupled with the $50 rebate was a better price than here.  Most of the negative reviews I'd read about *any* laptop was that Windows 8 was horrible.  Well, that has nothing to do with the performance of the laptop.  AND, Toshiba sends you a free e-copy of Windows 8 for Dummies (only 32 pages) so there's no excuse to say you don't know how to navigate.  Memory was a huge selling point for me, there's lots of it on this machine, and it had a better processor than some of the others I was looking at. I did have to change some of the settings on the touchpad because I didn't like the defaults (i.e. to scroll you have to use TWO fingers and I'd rather use one on the side or bottom).  You have to be slightly deliberate in your typing, but I'm ok with that too.  And I've really been impressed with the battery life.  I can work on it for up to four hours (maybe a little more).  The web cam is very clear and adjusts the light accordingly.  My husband and I Tango (free video chat app) and the images are good (depending on your signal).  I installed Office Home Professional without any trouble.  It's light for the size it is.  I would highly recommend this machine to anyone in the market!

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been shopping for a laptop for about a month now and almost went for another HP but decided to try a Toshiba instead and so far I am completely happy with this decision. First time using Windows 8 but I am catching on quickly.. very easy to set up and super quiet. The laptop is quite fast and  quiet, and so far works for what I need. ok so the not so good things, the keyboard is ok... it feels kinda cheaply made like I may lose keys for some reason... also the sound isn't that great as well so I will end up purchasing external speakers but its ok Im not too picky about it. Also I expedited the shipping but didn't get it in a timely manner which kinda upset me a little bit as I paid extra for that and if I would have done regular shipping it would have been free and I prob would have gotten it at the same time.... I will recommend this product as a light to medium user who doesn't need to do anything extravagant like heavy gaming... thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Title: very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Size a litttle bigger for my taste. but is great laptop screen very nice and 6g of memory gives good performance

Reviews.Title: overall good experience
Reviews.Author: suhas
Reviews.Content: i am glatd to buy this laptot till now its working good and met my expectationsI will shuggest to buy this good deal

Reviews.Title: First time buyer
Reviews.Author: F. Hartl
Reviews.Content: This is my first Laptop and overall it has been a good experience and alot of fun.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Melitza Castillo
Reviews.Content: The laptop is good for the price and it makes the job.The screen has a good resolution and the exterior design it's fine

Reviews.Title: Its a good machine
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: I can't complain.  Its given me no issues whatsoever except the mouse sort of sticks, and I'm not sure how to correct that, it annoys me but not that big an issue. I'm sure its in settings, something I am missing.  I'd buy again, but for me, a little bigger screen. But I have two HP products with no complaints.

Reviews.Title: unprofessional seller
Reviews.Author: mikeyc
Reviews.Content: Purchased this laptop for my son to use while away at college. The mouse pad on the lap top stopped working within the first month that he had the laptop.  Now the laptop cannot be charged.  I contacted the seller and they pretty much belittled me and my attempt to get a replacement.  DO NOT  purchase anything from this seller, unless you want to be treated with total disdain.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer -- Never a Problem
Reviews.Author: Mr. Thomas E. Gackle "Mr. Helpful"
Reviews.Content: I've owned and used mine daily for a year and I would have to say it's the most reliable laptop I've ever owned.  Very fast and never a problem.  Not wild about Windows, but the computer itself is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: juan martinez
Reviews.Content: This laptop is wonderful, is very fast, excellent screen resolution (better with touch screen), good sound, good web cam (+3Mpixels is better), quickly start and shut down. The performance in video is very good, the usb transfer is faster with usb 3.0 and 2.0, copy and burn disc without problems, the panel touch is very sensitive. The laptop is not very hot in normal use: you must not block the vents under the equipment if you are using the processor at maximum performance, it is very hot. If using in a ventilated area, barely heated. Underweight, nice appearance in colour and shape. My laptop have win8: this software is still not good, have problems with external drivers for example my usb modem (gprs), but works gently with toshiba software. Before you use an older model toshiba (2004) and I had problems but now buy a new laptop (2013) and it works perfect, I recommend it. When the diagnosis of windows experience, the video card has the lowest performance and processor, the maximum performance.

Reviews.Title: Long time user of Toshiba.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I have owned Toshiba computers in the past and have never had any problems. I would recommend this computer to friends

Reviews.Title: Windows8 is terrible!
Reviews.Author: Bob Davis
Reviews.Content: Very difficult to navigate. Tried to use for work and will not support Cisco VOIP application. Seller would not allow return so be careful when purchasing via internet.

Reviews.Title: Love my Toshiba.
Reviews.Author: Susan1961
Reviews.Content: I love my Toshiba laptop. The only thing I dislike about it is the keyboard. It isn't as nice as the one on my last Toshiba. I do like that the keyboard is enclosed so that dust cannot get lodged inside. The laptop is fast and the screen is great. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Crystal Jekara
Reviews.Content: Happy with my decision to buy. Would recommend, it arrived very quickly,  faster than I anticipated. Windows 8 takes some getting used to but, after the initial shock wears off, it's a cool device.

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: J. Kim
Reviews.Content: When I got this laptop I was surprised how poor the sound was.  It sounds muffled.  The keyboard is pretty bad too. It feels cheap. Today I held my laptop upside to dislodge dirt stuck under one of keys and the keyboard fell out. Now the positives. The Wi-Fi never gave me issues.  And I can't remember the last time the computer froze and I've had this for months.  So even though this laptop sounds cheap and feels cheap I am okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Computer
Reviews.Author: Terri L. Neeley
Reviews.Content: Already have one Toshiba that we are constantly fighting over. This second one was a great addition for work!!!! Great product!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop, works excellent, fast and easy to operate :-D
Reviews.Author: Xin Gao "Xin Gao"
Reviews.Content: Toshiba satellite C855-S5194 is really a wonderful laptop for you to enjoy.It delivered on time, worked quiet and comparatively fast, you need a bit time to adapt to the keyboard and Win 8. Great deal and I'll sure to purchase more from this store! Thank you very much! ^_^

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite - C855-S5194 - Mercury Silver
Reviews.Author: David B. Ware "David"
Reviews.Content: This is a great value product with i3 processor for anyone who needs a good quality,reliable laptop with good range of features. Comes with the usual extra trial programs etc but if you spend a little time uninstalling what you don't need it's an awesome machine. Bit strange that there is no closing catch but otherwise it is well presented. Has a SD card reader and one fast USB 3.0. I had no difficulty setting up and the wifi works a treat.I gather that the DVD drive is a tad slower than it could be but not a problem for me as it is used mainly for internet access and spreadsheets etc.Good value machine at reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Bought four units
Reviews.Author: crystal g owonubi
Reviews.Content: Not bad at all. I love the scratch free casing. One unit developed wifi issues shortly after activation though. Unfortunately I am too far to return for a warranty exchange.

Reviews.Title: Tobisha satellite
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: First, I like it. While browsing through the Internet it freezes without warning and disconnected the Wi-Fi. Another words, it sucks. Right now I am in a process of placing it for someone to be look at. Going to cost $$. I can't recommend to anyone yet until I know what kind of product I'm dealing with.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: very good product great, i love my computer toshiba  , I'm happy to buy it is all you need. Fast, color full, arrived in good condition and well PROTECTED

Reviews.Title: The worst laptop computer I have ever purchased!
Reviews.Author: Betz "betzzz"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this at the Staples Store, here in PA.Everything seemed great at first, Wi-Fi fast, resolution great and then...2 months into it, the mouse stopped working, and then wouldn't start working again.  Third month into using it, the whole screen is black, power button won't turn off.  I took it back to Staples and they ran a check, and then told me, I had to call Toshiba.  I called Toshiba and I have to return it for $24.00 to get it repaired.  I shouldn't have to pay a dime, but if I want my, supposedly brand new computer, which cost me over $400.00 computer running again, I have to fork over the money, and I am now waiting on the box for them to send me, to ship it back in!This is simply unacceptable and unbelievable.  I would never buy another Toshiba, nor would I suggest one to anyone!I will update, after I get it back, and see how it works then.(Update)  I got it back, after a week, and it is working great now. It has super fast speed, and many, many apps, which I don't use.  I just use it, to surf the internet, and load my pics on it, that's it, can't tell you too much more about it, because of my computer use.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: csprow
Reviews.Content: Received sooner than expected. Works great, good speed. Very happy with this laptop. I would suggest downloading the latest video driver and touch pad driver, What a difference they made. Touch pad is smooth and reacts a lot better. Video is much smoother  with no delays.I highly recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: I don't like the sound
Reviews.Author: Osver Anna
Reviews.Content: I don't like the sound, I had Toshiba before and the sound was perfect. This one is not the same.

Reviews.Title: Stay away if you use Ubuntu
Reviews.Author: eb
Reviews.Content: For $413, I thought this would be a great deal. Unfortunately, it has been a real hassle to use with Ubuntu. I should have checked out the Ubuntu compatibility before I purchased it, but silly me, I thought I would have no problems with Toshiba products since there were no issues with the Toshiba Portege.Main issues:-Need to do all sorts of fixes to get the wireless working (Google it...the way to do it is there).-Trackpad doesn't work (this is some sort of compatibility issue, compiz crashes and won't even recognize it. I've spent a number of hours following different leads, but so far nothing works). Workaround is to use it with a USB mouse.It might be fine if you want to stick to Windows 8. Otherwise, if you want to use Ubuntu (and I suspect any flavor of Linux) pay a bit more and make sure the laptop has good reviews from Linux users.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba  satellite C855-S5194
Reviews.Author: Betty Esses
Reviews.Content: Although I still don't know how to close a program in this computer, as no manual comes with the laptop I am quite happy with this device .It's quick and very resourceful .I would probably enjoy it more if more instructions came with it.Bettina Essesbettyesses@uol.com.br

Reviews.Title: had some mishaps but service was good
Reviews.Author: abdur mohammed
Reviews.Content: had some little problems but was dealt with quickly. therefore i must comment the service dept. but i hope things dont happen like this again.

Reviews.Title: Computer is ok, TOSHIBA customer service is HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: E. G. Klaproth "BMW Rider"
Reviews.Content: So far, this computer ( my third Toshiba in a month, due to manufacturer defects) is ok. I will be keeping a close eye on it, since two have had bad Wi-Fi cards, and had to be returned. Luckily, I bought locally, and could return them in person, rather than mailing.I have dealt with Toshiba customer service 3 times now, and it is BY FAR the worst C/S I have ever talked to. Despite my knowledge of the unit, and how it worked, I was repeatedly given bad /untrue / ridiculous reasons for the failure. It was always suggested that my problems had NOTHING to do with the computer, and were always the fault of the internet provider (although other computers beside this one, and other devices performed flawlessly on the same network). I ended up finding that a lot of the other series of Toshiba laptops I had purchased indeed had some Wi-Fi problems, and that Toshiba Customer Service has been transferred to the Philippines, thus answering why it took twice as long to learn that the tech had no actual knowledge of the computer due to a language barrier.I only hope that THIS Toshiba is free of Wi-Fi problems, and that I don't EVER have to deal with Toshiba C/S again.I WON'T buy another Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Very weak in internet uses
Reviews.Author: Marks Ford
Reviews.Content: I really thought that this laptop would work well with my simple needs.  It did not.  One simple thing I needed from it was to play music from the Classical Archives.  It works well with my desktop and my iPad 1.  This computer cannot play a 3 minute track without stopping for "buffering" at least twice.  I felt like I was back in 2003, not 2013.  I tried to play the music via the music tile.  It routed me through Bing which was incompatible with the Classical Archives.  I was told to get Flash.  When I clicked for it, I was told that if I had Windows 8 I have Flash installed.  That plus a huge list of other things that I could try, told me not to waste my time on this computer.  I returned it the next day.  I have a paid subscription to the Classical Archives. Why does Bing have to insinuate itself between me and what I've paid for.Windows 8 is a ridiculous program.  However, I have enough experience with Windows to work my way through its smokescreens.  The apps create layers of junk between intelligent computer users and what they want.

Reviews.Title: boo
Reviews.Author: gayles
Reviews.Content: I got it the 5th my mom passed on june 1st  I just opened it it wont boot up or anything pos
